misc: Always a gentleman despite occasionally losing his temper on the course
biography: Daniel, a familiar face from Oulujokilaakson Golfklubi ry, is a seasoned competitor in the Hector Trophée, bringing a wealth of experience to the greens. With 7 past appearances, Daniel has proven his mettle in this challenging tournament. He is known to be a fierce competitor, always striving for excellence.
His dedication has translated into tangible success, as he has claimed the coveted Hector Trophée twice. Although the Victor Trophy has eluded him thus far, he has shown great skill.
Beyond his undeniable skill, Daniel is known for his sportsmanship. He is always a gentleman on the course, although he occasionally loses his temper.
While Daniel is not currently slated to participate in Hector Trophée 2025, fans will remember his past contributions to the event.
